title: Getty exhibition on illuminated choir books
content:
The Getty Museum has a current exhibition titled [Music for the Masses: Illuminated Choir Books](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162053/http:/www.getty.edu/art/exhibitions/music_masses/) that’s interesting not just for the manuscripts themselves, but also for the relationship between writing and music.

They also have an upcoming exhibition (November 2007 to January 2008) on [The Decorated Letter](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162053/http:/www.getty.edu/visit/exhibitions/future.html), which focuses on illuminated letters from 800 to 1500.
